snippet: The author always wanted a fixer-upper. Then a friend offered his house in rural Maine with the parting words, “it’s your problem now.”
abstract: Author Caitlin Shetterly describes experience of fulfilling longtime dream of hers by moving with her husband and son into fixer-upper house in rural Maine.
lead_paragraph: The author always wanted a fixer-upper. Then a friend offered his house in rural Maine with the parting words, “it’s your problem now.”

headline.seo: In a Fixer-Upper, Leaks and Love
headline.main: No Closets, but Plenty of Coal
headline.print_headline: No Closets, but Plenty of Coal
